name: Castles Puzzles
description:
An Castles puzzle. Each level consists of 48 elements that will need to be rotated so that they match all the elements.

The game has 15 levels. With each level, the pictures become a little more complicated.

If you are in a difficult situation, then click on the Q button, and the game will tell you where to place the desired item.

In the game, you can scroll through the levels without passing them, if they caused difficulties in passing, just click the mouse wheel.

The game will delight you with nice graphics and calm music.
